info.title: Cover Letter Generator
info.description: Cover letter generator allows you create cover letters using AI technology. It takes in a few details along with your Curriculum Vitae(CV) and helps you generate a well written cover letter.

example.content: replying to your content kind Sir

get.summary: Get All Replies To A Forum Post

post.description: This end point is used to store a user to the database
This endpoint is used to verify the user. This is accomplished by passing in the otp sent to the user email. This endpoint assumes only the owner of the email can access the otp.
This endpoint is used to log a user in to the application. A user id and token is generated to be used for protected routes.
This endpoint is used for a user that forgets his/her password. A mail containing an otp is sent to the user which will be validated through the Validate Otp endpoint.

This endpoint is used to validate the otp sent to a user's email from the Forgot Password endpoint. If the otp is a correct one, a user token is sent which can then be used in the Reset Password endpoint.
This endpoint allows a user to reset/change their password. This endpoint is a protected route and requires a token to passed in the header. This token is gotten from the Validate Otp endpoint.

put.description: This endpoint is used to update the password of a signed in user. This endpoint is a protected route and requires a token to be passed in the header. This token can be gotten from the Login endpoint.

application/json.example: Kindly Check your email for the verifcation code

post.description: This endpoint accepts the CV file. The file must not exceed 5mb in size.

data.cover_letter:
Dear Mark,

I am writing to apply for the role of Backend Developer at Google. I am confident that my skills and experience make me the perfect candidate for this role.

I have a degree in Computer Science from the University of Toronto and I have been working as a backend developer for the past two years. I have experience with a variety of programming languages and I am confident that I can learn any new language that is required.

I am excited about the opportunity to work at Google and I am confident that I can make a valuable contribution to the team. I am looking forward to the opportunity to learn and grow in this role.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Sincerely,

John Henry

post.description: A post request is made to this endpoint along with all the required details about the job in the body. This request accepts only form inputs and not JSON

company_name.description: The name of the company being applied to

data.cover_letter:
Dear Mark,

I am writing to apply for the role of Backend Developer at Google. I am confident that my skills and experience make me the perfect candidate for this role.

I have a degree in Computer Science from the University of Toronto and I have been working as a backend developer for the past two years. I have experience with a variety of programming languages and I am confident that I can learn any new language that is required.

I am excited about the opportunity to work at Google and I am confident that I can make a valuable contribution to the team. I am looking forward to the opportunity to learn and grow in this role.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Sincerely,

John Henry

Dear Mr. / Ms. (Lastname): (or “Dear Campus Recruitment Representative/Hiring Manager”) 
 
Re:  Backend Developer at Google 
 
First paragraph: Briefly sum up your value to the employer by stating your interest in the 
position and the organization. You should also list your relevant education in the opening. Your 
goal is to capture the reader's attention and encourage them to read on! This paragraph 
highlights what you will expand on and demonstrate in your resume. It summarizes your relevant 
and then indicates the top two or three skills that make you a great fit for the position. Also try 
demonstrating your knowledge/interest in the organization by integrating something specific 
about what you know about them (i.e., mission/mandate, projects/activities, research interests, 
strategic goals) in relation to how you can contribute or skills you offer.  
 
Middle paragraphs: Further highlight your suitability for the position by expanding on your 
skills through specific examples of your previous accomplishments (i.e., work experience and 
roles, volunteer experience, and/or academic examples). Think from the employer’s point of view 
as you write. In what ways are you a good fit for the organization? Be sure to emphasize 
outcomes and results whenever possible. Try to keep your paragraphs to 3-5 concise, confident 
statements. Remember that this letter will serve as a writing sample so grammar/spelling is 
critical.  
 
Use the closing paragraph to express your appreciation for reviewing your cover letter and 
resume.  This is also a great place to let them know how they can easily contact you. Be sure to 
list that contacting you through the TRU Co-op program is also an option (email/phone).   
 
Sincerely, 
 
Your Signature (John Henry) 
 
Typed Name

post.description: This endpoint saves a generated cover letter to the database. A Bearer token gotten on user log in must be passed to the header when making the request

example.cover_letter:
My name is Ubongabasi Tommy and I am a civil engineering student at the University of Uyo, Nigeria. I am writing in regards to the Back end dev position at Google. I am confident that I am the ideal candidate for this role, as my skills and experience perfectly match the job description.

As a Backend Engineer at Middey Technologies, I was responsible for designing and implementing API endpoints using Expressjs. I also handled CI/CD compliant deployment with Heroku and aided in testing and documentation with Postman. My experience and skills will be a valuable asset to your team.

I am currently pursuing a B.Eng in Civil Engineering at the University of Uyo, Nigeria and will be graduating in 2023. My coursework has taught me advanced mathematical and problem solving skills, as well as general engineering principles. I have also gained experience in leadership and collaboration as Class Captain, and in teaching as a Volunteer Tutor.

In addition to my experience and education, I have strong technical skills in Javascript, Nodejs, and Python. I am also proficient in Git, REST API, and Google. My soft skills include excellent communication, time management, accountability, and emotional intelligence.

I am confident that I am the ideal candidate for the Back end dev position at Google. I would appreciate the opportunity to discuss my qualifications further with you. Thank you for your time and consideration.

Sincerely,

Ubongabasi Tommy
